law.catch_line: In Queen Anne's County, when any tax sale made prior to July 1, 1985 has been finally ratified, then...
law.text: In Queen Anne's County, when any tax sale made prior to July 1, 1985 has been finally ratified, then no circuit court in this State shall on and after July 1, 1987, entertain any proceedings to set aside or modify any title to any interest obtained in such sale.
